summary: This module defines a SubmenuButton control that serves as an interactive button to display a cascading submenu. It supports placement within a menu bar or as a standalone element, offering configurable alignment, visual styling, leading/trailing content, and event callbacks for focus, hover, opening, and closing actions.
business_intent: Enable developers to easily incorporate hierarchical, interactive menus into Flet applications, improving navigation and user experience through a reusable, customizable submenu button component.
